sentences.en: Break down the apparently unattainable activity to small doable steps.
sentences.cn: 把显然做不到的事情分成可行的步骤.

sentences.en: Break large projects into smaller and doable parts.
sentences.cn: 把大的项目分成较小的、能干得了的若干部分.

sentences.en: But holding the line at current levels is doable -- and necessary.
sentences.cn: 但是拿着在当前层的线是可行的 -- 并且必要.

sentences.en: Doable measures on remanufacturing about storing liquid petroleum gas were put forward.
sentences.cn: 文章针对我国液化石油气球罐的研究现状,提出了切实可行的再制造技术在该行业的解决办法.

sentences.en: Is this project something that you think is doable?
sentences.cn: 你认为这个项目可行吗？
这事星期五之前做不了。

sentences.en: Ride to Shattrath ( easily doable at 60 ) to set your Hearthstone and grab the flight path.
sentences.cn: 如果你不想依赖法师,那就把你的炉石放在暴风城.

sentences.en: The details and negotiations for such an arrangement would be formidable but doable.
sentences.cn: 这种安排的细节和谈判将是艰难的,但是可行.

sentences.en: The droit of patent application as an inpawningobject is legal and doable.
sentences.cn: 专利申请权作为质押标的是合乎法理并且是可行的.

sentences.en: We’ve got to think first whether this plan is doable.
sentences.cn: 我们得先考虑一下这计划是否可行。

words.tran_cn: 要求；规定；C大调音阶中的第一音

trans.tran_en: able to be done or completed
